name: Vishaltonpe.GitHub.io-projects
body:
### My Projects.
My SOA and Hadoop projects.

```
Project Name: move.com (Jan-2015 to till date)
Platform : Oracle SOA suite 12 c , SOAPUI 
Project Information: move.com is a real estate website. We are using Oracle SOA Suite 12c to integrate CDH and SFDC. We are using cloud adaptor for it. Also using REST API's.
My Role: Developing interfaces in SOA and deploying. Also migrating interfaces from one environment to another as per requirement. Working with SFDC cloud adaptor as well as SOAP/REST API's.
```

```
Project Name: tata sky (April-2014 to Nov-2014)
Platform : Oracle J-Developer , Oracle OUAF Framework , Oracle ORS Application 
Project Information: Tata Sky was project developed using Oracle ORS application for that Oracle OUAF framework was used. Real time scheduling application for tata sky installers .
My Role: Wrote java code and deployed as per requirement. Also migrating scripts and java code from one environment to another as per requirement.
```
Going to add my Hadoop Projects Soon.

### Webpage Under Construction. 


### Thank you for visiting my webpage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
